backend/main.mo: Actor manages consultancy forms and partner registrations with create, list, and status‑update functions using Map storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing removal of a specific hyperlink in Footer.tsx with metadata and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app setup configuring router routes, global layout, theme provider, and query client.
frontend/src/components/CareerSection.ts: Empty component file placeholder for the CareerSection component.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Empty component file placeholder for the ContactSection component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with branding, social links, navigation buttons, and descriptive text.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with logo, navigation menus, dropdowns, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Empty component file placeholder for the Hero component.
frontend/src/components/Products.tsx: Empty component file placeholder for the Products component.
frontend/src/components/ScrollToTop.tsx: Scrolls to top on mount and on route load by subscribing to router events.
frontend/src/components/SolarCalculatorA: Displays solar calculation assumptions using UI cards and badges based on provided data.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppFab.tsx: Floating WhatsApp button that opens a prefilled chat message to a fixed phone number.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication via DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for submitting and fetching consultancy forms, partner registrations, offerings, and solutions through the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables, themes, and animation utilities for the app.
frontend/src/lib/formatCurrency.ts: Utility for formatting INR values with Indian numbering system and optional compact notation.
frontend/src/lib/solarCalculator.ts: Implements solar system calculations, assumptions, validation, and cost/savings estimation logic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/CareersPage.tsx: Displays a careers page with a hero section, upcoming job openings notice, and lists of company benefits and future roles.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialSolarPage.t: Renders a commercial solar solutions page with a hero section, business benefits cards, and a CTA for consultation.
frontend/src/pages/ExpertConsultancyPage: Implements a consultation request page with a form, validation, submission handling, and a hero section.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Defines the homepage featuring a solar savings calculator, validation logic, and multiple marketing sections.
frontend/src/pages/HybridSystemPage.tsx: Shows a hybrid solar system overview with a hero section, explanation steps, and a CTA to request a quote.
frontend/src/pages/IndustrialSolarPage.t: Presents industrial solar solutions with a hero section and cards outlining high‑capacity, storage, and durability features.
frontend/src/pages/OffGridSystemPage.tsx: Renders an off-grid solar system marketing page with descriptions, steps, and a quote CTA.
frontend/src/pages/OnGridSystemPage.tsx: Renders an on-grid solar system page explaining grid-connected benefits and system steps with a quote CTA.
Shows a residential solar solutions page highlighting benefits, features, and a consultation CTA.
frontend/src/pages/SolarAttaChakkiPage.t: Presents a solar-powered atta chakki product page with benefits and a quote CTA.
frontend/src/pages/SolarCalculatorPage.t: Empty placeholder file for a future solar calculator page.
frontend/src/pages/SolarWaterPumpPage.ts: Displays a solar water pump product page outlining benefits and offering a quote CTA.
frontend/src/pages/TrustedPartnerPage.ts: React page rendering a partner registration form with validation, image section, and mutation submission using a custom hook with toast notifications.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, shadows, and container settings while enabling plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, feature requests, versions, and a pending task to remove a footer link.
